int getHeadPosition ( IplImage *  frame,
CvPoint *  upperHeadCorner,
int *  headWidth,
int *  headHeight 
)

internal ehci function to get 2d head upper left corner, width and height the width and height are proportional to Viola-Jones trained cascade which are a little bit smaller than the real ones

returns 0 if no head was found
